welcome_message_body: Welcome to Allentown, where the historic charm meets modern attractions. Known for its rich cultural heritage and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Luna's Bakery
restaurants.description: Luna's Bakery is a bakery located in Allentown.

restaurants.description: Bay Leaf Restaurant is a asian restaurant located in Allentown.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport is where all commercial flights are served.

terminals.name: Hangar Terminal
terminals.description: The hangar terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal where all flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport houses all commercial airline operations as well as airport services and amenities.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport serves private and charter flights, as well as offering services such as fueling and maintenance.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
